data.name: Original NY Plain Cheesecake
data.description: What all New York- style cheesecakes aspire to be. Creamy but not heavy, light without falling apart as you take a forkful, and of course, that rich flavor. Rated “Best Overall” by the Wall Street Journal.

data.name: Key Lime Pie Cheesecake
data.description: Our Original New York Cheesecake with a graham crust and with a layer of homemade key lime pie baked on top. This beautiful and seasonal cake is both tart and sweet and perfectly complemented by our creamy cheesecake, is topped with fresh whipped cream. Delicious and refreshing!

data.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
data.description: The original Worlds Most Fabulous Cheesecake is topped with fresh strawberry pie filling and baked into a graham crust. Finished with our macaroon crunch.

data.name: Raspberry Swirl
data.description: C’est magnifique... the delicately delicious whirl of real French raspberry puree in delightful contrast with the smooth richness of Junior’s cheesecake.

data.name: Red Velvet Cheesecake
data.description: A traditional favorite with a Junior's twist. Homemade moist Red Velvet cake is layered with our Original New York cheesecake and our famous cream cheese icing. Adorned with even more icing and cake crumbs.

data.name: Brownie Marble Swirl
data.description: Don‘t tell the kids about this one until you‘ve had your fill. Tasty chocolate brownie mix and cheesecake with a chocolate brownie bottom.

data.name: Cherry Crumb
data.description: It‘s cherry blossom time the year ‘round with this luscious cherry filled, crumbly streusel-topped cheesecake.

data.name: White Chocolate Raspberry
data.description: Our Original New York Cheesecake is blended with premium white chocolate and swirled with fresh raspberry puree and baked atop a chocolate cookie crust. The entire cake is decorated with a raspberry mirror and finished with a white chocolate mousse border for fresh raspberry and white chocolate in every bite.

data.name: Lemon Coconut Cheesecake
data.description: Our Original New York cheesecake is topped with fresh lemon custard crème, layered with yellow chiffon cake and finished with real buttercream frosting and fresh coconut.

data.name: Carrot Cake Cheesecake
data.description: Our Original New York cheesecake is layered with a traditional carrot cake, made with fresh carrots and cinammon. Frosted with Juniors own cream cheese frosting.
